actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: Concurrent resolution to recognize the Washington-Rochambeau National Historic Route.

summary.text: Provides that the Washington-Rochambeau Route used by the combined French and American forces of General Washington to accomplish the American victory at Yorktown, Virginia, October 19, 1781, should be recognized by the Federal, State, county, and local governments of this country as "The Washington-Rochambeau National Historic Route."

titles.title: Concurrent resolution to recognize the Washington-Rochambeau National Historic Route.
